span.span: The source of the event, the control.
An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 控件的 、、 和 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the , , , and events of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将控件与业务对象和控件结合使用来删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初使用由属性指定的方法从`EmployeeLogic`对象中检索数据, 从而显示一组所有雇员。 The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 由于属性设置为`true`, 因此该控件会自动显示 "删除" 按钮。 Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果单击 "**删除**" 按钮, 则将使用属性指定的方法和集合中指定的任何参数执行该操作。If you click the **Delete** button, the action is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中, 还执行了一些预处理和后处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. 在`NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`执行 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` 操作之前调用委托来处理事件, 并在操作完成后调用委托来处理事件, 以便执行异常处理。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the action is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the action has completed, to perform exception handling. 在此示例中, 如果`NorthwindDataException`引发了, 则由该委托处理。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by this delegate. 若要检查此代码示例`EmployeeLogic`使用的中间层业务对象的实现, 请参阅中的类概述。To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see the class overview in .
